The second section of text should now be blue, too. But what was up with those `id` bits?
`id` is key for turning normal, boring `<div>` tags into unique tags.
Because you gave those two `<div>`s different names, you can style them individually.
Change your `div` line in the `<style>` tag to `div#first` . We're going to make our `<div>`s different colors.
Then, write another line below that for the `<div>` named "second".
It should be `div#second { color:green; }` (or a different color if you like).
Check out your page, the two `div`s should be different colors!
